import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { useMutation, useQuery } from '@apollo/client' import { EDIT_AUTHOR } from '../queries' import { ALL_AUTHORS } from '../queries' import Select from 'react-select' const Authors = ( { show, authors } ) => { const [name, setName] = useState(authors.allAuthors.map(a => a.name)) const [born, setBorn] = useState('') const [ editAuthor ] = useMutation(EDIT_AUTHOR, { refetchQueries: [ { query: ALL_AUTHORS } ] }) console.log('frontin authit data', name) const submit = async (event) => { event.preventDefault() editAuthor({ variables: { name, born } }) setName('') setBorn('') } if (!show) { return null } const handleChange = (e) => { return name[e.target.value] } return (
